title: Spring Art Walk Packages Release
excerpt: Reserve now to receive gallery passes, sunset tram tickets, and rooftop welcome drinks during Lisbon's art season.
body: Lisbon’s spring gallery circuit is back and we’re celebrating with a curated stay package for design lovers.
Book any stay in March or April and receive two multi-gallery passes, a sunset ride on historic Tram 28, and access to our Friday rooftop sessions.
Add the package during booking or email our team after reserving. Quantities are limited each weekend.

title: Renovated Cowork Lounge Now Open
excerpt: Find new ergonomic seating, faster Wi-Fi, and Lisbon coffee taps in our refreshed cowork commons.
body: We’ve amplified the Sunlit Commons to support remote workers and creative travelers.
Expect additional ergonomic seating, dedicated phone booths, and dual-band Wi-Fi with enterprise-level speeds.
Complimentary Lisbon roastery cold brew now flows daily from 08:00.

title: Weeknight Stays Include Welcome Sangria
excerpt: Check in Sunday–Thursday to toast the city with our house-made ruby sangria.
body: Receive a complimentary glass of our signature ruby sangria when you arrive Sunday through Thursday.
Made in-house with local vinho verde, citrus, and seasonal herbs, it’s the perfect kick-off to Bairro Alto evenings.
Ask the bar team for recommendations on the best night markets to pair with your toast.

title: Rooftop Sessions Return Fridays
excerpt: Secure a spot for sundown DJ sets with Lisbon creatives on our terrace each Friday.
body: Our Friday rooftop series is back with rotating Lisbon DJs and pop-up mixologists.
Reserved spots include priority bar access and complimentary tapas bites from local chefs.
Add the session to your reservation or RSVP via hello@vidahostellisbon.com.

title: Shared Kitchen Refresh on 14 April
excerpt: We’re resurfacing counters and updating appliances; the kitchen will pause service 14 April 12:00–18:00.
body: Heads up travelers: the Brickwork Kitchen closes 14 April from noon to 18:00 for resurfacing and appliance calibration.
Our lobby will stock complimentary snacks and cold brew while the work wraps.
Thank you for your patience while we keep the space polished for your next meal.

title: Early Bird Bookings for Summer Festivals
excerpt: Secure your bunk or suite early to receive complimentary transit passes during Lisbon’s summer festivals.
body: Lisbon’s summer festival calendar fills fast—lock in your stay before 30 April and we’ll add two 24-hour metro passes per reservation.
Festival guides with neighborhood pop-ups and secret afterparties drop exclusively to direct bookers.
Email the reservations team once you book to redeem your passes.
